"Hi bees," said Bobo. "Can I have some honey, please?" But the bees did not want to share. They buzzed and buzzed, and chased Bobo away.

One day, a little boy named Tim was excited to play. He put his toys in a sack. He put the sack on his shoulder. Tim walked to the park.
At the park, Tim met a girl named Sue. Sue said, "What is in the sack?" Tim said, "My toys! I will show you." They played with the toys together.
After playing, Tim and Sue were tired. They put the toys back in the sack. Tim put the sack on his shoulder. They went home with big smiles.
